Dixon Jr Pants are made ​​of the softest jersey and has beautiful all-over gold print. Front pockets, cheat back pocket as well as wide and comfortable elastic waist with a touch of gold and draw string.

In order to keep the pretty appearance of the Dixon-series and to protect the gold print in the best way possible, we recommend the following care instructions:

Wash & Care:
Always wash the clothes inside out.
Wash at 40° max. and choose a short machine wash at a gentle setting/reduced agitation and high water level.
Spin the clothes with max. 800 rpm (revolutions per minute).
Use liquid detergent without enzymes and do not use softener and spot remover.

Drying:
Empty the washing machine right after the washing is finished.
Hang the clothes, preferable on a hanger.
We generally advise against tumble drying.



Available in: Grey, Light rose & Navy

Size labelling is based on height measurement of the child in cm.

Quality: 50% Polyester, 50% Viscose
